content: hey friends I want to talk about some pictures and some video after video of
my game of the rise of Tiamat this is an the place in the module the players have
reached the iceberg of the white dragon if you haven't played this so you should
probably stop watching now if you're a DM watch on watch on so as the players
approach the iceberg they run into some ice hunters I had this boat I made and
the ice hunters are 3d printed so very cool I thought this came out great and
when the the players get to the top of the iceberg they see the the ice hunters
village and all these crafts I'm going to show in later videos so I thought
this came out really neat really cool also the ice Tigers were trying to get
rid of the players so they had a single combat and the players chose their month
you can see the monk on top of the ice formation there in the center the
village and the players around watching the combat and unfortunately the player
got defeated so they had to leave but they ended up sneaking in so they snuck
into the iceberg itself they found some interesting things they found a room
trophy room as frozen frost giants and I had a boat in their trophy boat in there
from with the dragon and captured in this kind of thing so pretty neat they
were trying to rescue the captive crimson and while they were doing that
they got attacked and you can see the Elephant Man in the back well it's a
mammoth and I had these things called the spirits of the undying and they were
like these guards of the dragon I didn't want to have the trolls so I had these
things and these were 3d printed too so pretty neat pretty neat had some great
fights there and as the players you know try to penetrate the iceberg more they
run into a cliff that they have to try to get up and that's that's a pretty
difficult challenge for them there they finally get to the lower level where the
dragon is I had this magical item here which is pretty cool these both these
things are 3d printed the head is clear 3d printed and the bottom here is
printed off thing verse so pretty cool it was spewing fog into the cavern this
frosty fog that we are trying to deal with that they got attacked by these
yetis and these yetis are also 3d printed so I had a pretty vicious battle
they and then the dragon shows up and you can
see I have a corpse on the Dragons back I ended up making this not the dragon
that was supposed to be there but its mate and they ended up conning it's made
into getting what they needed they needed these books and they ended up
calling her out of it pretending they were cultists and that
kind of thing so that worked pretty well pretty neat I love that dragon that's
really neat and here let me give you a look at the table here that I had
everything set up on my kind of staging tables so I buy these cheap tables that
I can stage my stuff on right and they're just kind of fold-out plastic
tables here I've got my DM station here different various clear boxes of my
terrain that I'm going to use for the session pan over here there's the dragon
nice other boxes of terrain and minis I'm going to use terrain kind of
partially preset up here other minis there's a village we were talking about
here's the ship they were on the icebreaker ship pretty cool and some
other stuff staged down there during the adventure and so I have kind of have
like a cul-de-sac of you know terrain and and and props and things set up
behind me at as a DM so there we go I hope you enjoyed this kind of sneak peek
backstage look at my DMS station all my wife's dice
